location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Translation of a firman from His Majesty the King of Persia to His Royal Highness the Prince of Fars

mods.abstract: The firman regards the arrival of an ambassador to Russia within the province of Azerbaijan with instructions to extend friendship and amity to Persia, and bearing expensive gifts as offerings to the friendship, and instructs the Prince on how to conduct his government and people in relation to this firman.
